author: remm
msg: - Avoid doing a Class.forName on a non existing class (which would check
all classloaders up to the root classloader).
- Cache the retrieved class (since there is a limited number of roles defined).

author: remm
msg: - Will now correctly unmarshal negative permissions correctly.

author: juergen
msg: Removed not necessary ";" to prevent CodeGuide compile error

author: remm
msg: - The default configuration will now use roles (and map them to names),
self permissions, negative permissions (but there is a missing feature in the
XML unmarshaller, so they are treated as normal permissions) and

author: remm
msg: - Add a howto fo configuring the JDBC store.
- Link to the nightly build results.
